meanings.definition: a person suffering from hebephrenia, a form of schizophrenia characterized by disorganized behavior and speech.
meanings.sent1: The hebephrenics in the support group shared their experiences with disorganized behavior.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying how to help hebephrenics with their speech difficulties.
meanings.sent3: The hebephrenics at the party kept mixing up their words, creating funny misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt like a room full of hebephrenics, each speaking a different language.
meanings.sent5: The image of the hebephrenics pacing back and forth in the hospital hallway stayed with me.
